message: GLOBAL_REGISTRY.json shows 44 active_tasks and 105 active_agents - these counts never decrement because task status never transitions from INITIALIZED to ACTIVE/COMPLETED

data.root_cause: No task lifecycle state machine functions in state_db.py
data.impact: Dashboard shows incorrect active task counts

message: Need to integrate lifecycle transitions at 3 key points: (1) When first agent deploys -> transition task to ACTIVE, (2) When agent status changes to terminal -> check task completion, (3) When all agents complete -> transition task to COMPLETED

integration_points: mark_agent_terminal in state_db already handles auto-rollup
data.approach: Use state_db functions for all transitions to ensure single source of truth

message: Successfully implemented and tested task/agent lifecycle transitions. All functions work correctly: transition_task_to_active, transition_task_to_completed, check_task_completion, mark_agent_terminal, and count functions.
